name: Hafnia Limited
description: Hafnia Limited is a leading provider of shipping and logistics services, specializing in the transportation of oil and petroleum products. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Singapore, Hafnia has rapidly established itself as a prominent player in the global shipping industry. The company operates a modern fleet of tankers, offering a range of services including time charters and spot charters for both clean and dirty petroleum products. Hafnia is committed to maintaining high operational standards and safety protocols, ensuring that its vessels are equipped with advanced technology to meet the evolving demands of the maritime industry. With a focus on sustainability, Hafnia is actively pursuing initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint and contribute to environmental protection through efficient shipping practices and investment in eco-friendly technologies. The company's strategic growth is supported by a robust management team with extensive experience in shipping and logistics, allowing Hafnia to navigate the complexities of global trade effectively. As Hafnia continues to expand its fleet and service offerings, it aims to enhance its position as a trusted partner in the maritime sector, delivering value to its customers while upholding its commitment to safety and environmental stewardship.
ceo: Rolf D. D. J. E. Skat-Rørdam

key_executives.name: Rolf D. D. J. E. Skat-Rørdam

seo.meta_title: Hafnia Limited | Leading Shipping and Logistics Provider
seo.meta_description: Discover Hafnia Limited, a leader in shipping and logistics services specializing in oil and petroleum transportation. Explore our commitment to safety and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Hafnia offer?
faq.answer: Hafnia offers shipping services including time charters and spot charters for oil and petroleum products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hafnia?
faq.answer: Rolf D. D. J. E. Skat-Rørdam is the CEO of Hafnia Limited.
